homeTopBanner.header: Talk like a native with the best online tutors.

text.line1: Academic English competency is critical in university and careers. Inkstone offers courses and writing assistance to enable learners to use English more like native users.
text.line2: Inkstone's teaching team fully comprises of native English speakers and experienced private tutors. Our clients have achieved top scores in IELTS, TOEFL, SAT, IB and A-level examinations. We have worked with international adult professionals in the business, tourism and security industries.

homePromoInternational.text: Our home grown team of teachers from Macau are now based in Europe, North America, Asia, and Oceania, bringing you the proper international English experience.

homePromoStudents.text: Our tutors are based in top universities across the world with different specializations, helping us relate to diverse students.

homePromoExperienced.text: Our tutors have 3-7 years of one-to-one teaching experience in various subjects.

homePromoQuality.text: We work closely with our tutors to ensure top performance.
